headline: Flixy Stick Draws Scrutiny as Consumers Research Streaming Alternatives Amid Rising Subscription Costs
summary: Search patterns reveal verification-seeking behavior as households evaluate one-time-purchase streaming devices against ongoing subscription commitmentsNEW YORK, NY, Dec. 31, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Disclaimer: This article is for informational purposes only.
